summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons incident report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The report alleges Epstein attempted to introduce drugs into the Special Housing Unit visiting room. The report includes sections for incident description, committee action, and investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate named in the incident report, alleged to have attempted to introduce drugs into the Special Housing Unit visiting room.

persons.name: Hunter
persons.context: The staff member who filed the incident report, identified as the Unit Officer who observed the incident.

events.title: Alleged Drug Introduction Attempt by Epstein
events.description: At approximately 1:40 PM, Unit Officer Hunter observed inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit visiting room allegedly attempt to grab an unknown item from his visitor. The officer called for a lieutenant, and Epstein was removed from the unit.

keyFacts: The incident report alleges inmate Jeffrey Epstein attempted to introduce drugs (Prohibited Act Code 111A) into the Special Housing Unit visiting room on August 9, 2019.
The reporting officer, Hunter, observed Epstein reach to grab an unknown item from his visitor before intervening.
Epstein was removed from the unit following the incident, and the report was referred to a Discipline Hearing Officer (DHO) for further hearing.
The document is a standard Bureau of Prisons form (BP-A0288) for reporting inmate disciplinary incidents.
